-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Haskell JSON library with an emphasis on simplicity, minimal dependencies, and ease of use.
--   
@package easyjson
@version 0.1.0.1

module Text.EasyJson
data Json
Number :: Double -> Json
String :: Text -> Json
Bool :: Bool -> Json
Null :: Json
Array :: (Vector Json) -> Json
Object :: (HashMap Text Json) -> Json
jsonType :: Json -> Text
type JError = Text
type JReader = Either JError
showT :: Show a => a -> Text
json :: Text -> JReader Json
key :: Text -> Json -> JReader Json
index :: Int -> Json -> JReader Json
letter :: Int -> Json -> JReader Char
array :: Json -> JReader (Vector Json)
object :: Json -> JReader (HashMap Text Json)
number :: Json -> JReader Double
string :: Json -> JReader Text
bool :: Json -> JReader Bool
null :: Json -> JReader ()
